message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $1,200,000. My goal is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, and I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between the perceived value to you and the intrinsic worth of the product. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can make this a mutually beneficial arrangement.
